alert.note: Alert for Butte; Haakon; Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 10:09PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Haakon, southeastern Butte, eastern Meade, northwestern Jackson and northeastern Pennington Counties through 1045 PM MDT... At 1008 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Owl Butte to 5 miles southeast of Quinn. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Philip, Wall, Union Center, Plainview, Quinn, Enning, Elm Springs, Grindstone, Stoneville, Marcus, Creighton, White Owl, Red Owl, Cottonwood, Delta 9 Missile Silo, Grindstone Butte and Delta 1 Launch Facility. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota near Mile Marker 102, and between Mile Markers 106 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Haakon; Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
